column2: [From.GetName] will be converted to a military command. Doing so may displease some of your dynasty members and vassals.
[FromFrom.GetName] will be converted back to a regular holding.
[FromFrom.GetName] will be converted back to a regular holding. This will make [From.GetBestName] very pleased.
[target_unmake_military.GetName] is converted to a regular holding.
[target_make_military.GetName] is converted to a military command.
Must be a temporary military command.
Must not already be a military command.
